So some random guy found out BOTH our passwords. I
doubt it. Furthermore mine was assigned to me by Yahoo
when my old one wasn't working and let me assure you
it was totally random. Now that I've changed it
there's no danger in telling you it was
"ironbarrow800" who in the heck is going to guess
that. By the way what was your old password.
